Rule: Higher education (Masters, Doctorate, Bachelors, Prof-school) leads to higher income.
Sales, Professional, and White-Collar occupations lead to higher income.
Gender being Male leads to higher income.
Occupation change to 'Sales', 'White-Collar', or 'Professional' leads to higher income.
Reduction in hours combined with an occupation change leads to higher income.
Age increase combined with favorable occupation leads to higher income.
Gender independent of favorable occupation can lead to higher income.
